main.name: Ankit Bihani
main.description: I am working as fullstack developer for 2.5 years, I have hands on php, laravel, javascript, nodejs, reactjs, python, django
main.bio: After earning my post graduation degree in MCA from SVIM, I entered in IT world, as associate php developer, to explore my passion for programming and real world problem solving. Now, after the 2.5 years I am working as fullstack developer worked on various technologies and tools.

work.description: It is service base company, I've joined as php fresher and now became a fullstack developer. I have worked on laravel, wordpress, php, javascript, nodejs, reactjs.

projects.title: iSalamah
projects.category: This project is for maintenance service provider company.Users can buy items as well can create services and ticket will be generate on service, those will be resolved by Technician.

projects.title: 3ndy
projects.category: Multivendor ecommerce mobile application. The user needs registration to sell and purchase products. The seller can design his page how it looks when user visits and it needs admin approval. The user can purchase from multiple vendors and the billing will be in single invoice
